Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT PTplus Cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott i-STAT PTplus Cartridge with i-STAT 1 System for quantitative measurement of prothrombin time and INR in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of the clot time of the extrinsic coagulation pathway activated by thromboplastin in non-anticoagulated whole blood (venous or capillary), aiding in monitoring patients receiving coumarin anticoagulant therapy with prothrombin time results reported in seconds and INR, for point of care and prescription use only
